languages.text: "Малакай Дрек — бригадир пятого пищевого депо, который пайков недодает, скотина безмозглая. Никого страшнее выдумать не смог?"
"Malakai Drek is the foreman of the 5th food depot and known to skimp on his meals, you halfwit. Is that the most terrifying figure you could come up with?"
languages.original_text: "Малакай Дрек — бригадир пятого пищевого депо, который пайков недодает, скотина безмозглая. Никого страшнее выдумать не смог?"

traits.locale_text: "Malakai Drek is the foreman of the 5th food depot who is known to skimp on his meals, you halfwit. Is that the most terrifying figure you could come up with?"

"Malakai Drek is the foreman of the 5th food depot and known to skimp on his meals, you halfwit. Is that the most terrifying figure you could come up with?"

languages.text: « Malakaï Ter est le contremaître du cinquième dépôt de vivres et son seul crime est de lésiner sur les rations. C'est ça, votre seigneur et maître tant redouté ? »
languages.original_text: "Malakai Drek is the foreman of the 5th food depot and known to skimp on his meals, you halfwit. Is that the most terrifying figure you could come up with?"

traits.locale_text: « Malakaï Ter est le contremaître du cinquième dépôt de vivres et son seul crime est de lésiner sur les rations. C'est ça, votre seigneur et maître tant redouté ? »

languages.text: «Malakai Drek es el capataz del quinto depósito de comida y tiene reputación de racanear en las comidas, so mendrugo. ¿De verdad es la figura más aterradora que se te ocurre?».
languages.original_text: "Malakai Drek is the foreman of the 5th food depot and known to skimp on his meals, you halfwit. Is that the most terrifying figure you could come up with?"

traits.locale_text: «Malakai Drek es el capataz del quinto depósito de comida y tiene reputación de racanear en las comidas, so mendrugo. ¿De verdad es la figura más aterradora que se te ocurre?».

languages.text: “你这个蠢货，马莱凯·德雷克是五号粮库的领班，总是克扣工人的口粮。你能想到的最可怕的家伙，就只有这个人而已吗？”
languages.original_text: "Malakai Drek is the foreman of the 5th food depot and known to skimp on his meals, you halfwit. Is that the most terrifying figure you could come up with?"

traits.locale_text: “你这个蠢货，马莱凯·德雷克是五号粮库的领班，总是克扣工人的口粮。你能想到的最可怕的家伙，就只有这个人而已吗？”

languages.text: 「マラカイ・ドレックは第5食糧庫の監督で、食事を抜くことで知られている。それがお前の思いつく最も恐ろしい人物か？」
languages.original_text: "Malakai Drek is the foreman of the 5th food depot and known to skimp on his meals, you halfwit. Is that the most terrifying figure you could come up with?"

traits.locale_text: 「マラカイ・ドレックは第5食糧庫の監督で、食事を抜くことで知られている。それがお前の思いつく最も恐ろしい人物か？」

languages.text: "Malakai Drek ist der Vorarbeiter des 5. Lebensmitteldepots und ist bekannt für seinen Geiz, Ihr Dummkopf. Ist das die furchterregendste Gestalt, die Euch eingefallen ist?"
languages.original_text: "Malakai Drek is the foreman of the 5th food depot and known to skimp on his meals, you halfwit. Is that the most terrifying figure you could come up with?"

traits.locale_text: "Malakai Drek ist der Vorarbeiter des 5. Lebensmitteldepots und ist bekannt für seinen Geiz, Ihr Dummkopf. Ist das die furchterregendste Gestalt, die Euch eingefallen ist?"

languages.text: "Malakai Drek, gıda deposundaki ustabaşıdır ve yemek dağıtımında pintilik etmesiyle bilinir. Salak herif, aklına gelen en korkunç şahıs o mu?"
languages.original_text: "Malakai Drek is the foreman of the 5th food depot and known to skimp on his meals, you halfwit. Is that the most terrifying figure you could come up with?"
